name: CLVSTRFK of MusicNFTs by LUCTHELEO 1 of Ones

metadata.name: CLVSTRFK of MusicNFTs by LUCTHELEO 1 of Ones
metadata.description:
The Melodic Access Card (M.A.C.), is an onboarding NFT with EXTREME VALUE to not just LTL fans and investors but to music lovers in general.

Here’s a current list of how the M.A.C. gets its Value…. That’s RIGHT! “current list”... as technology grows, new platforms emerge, new VR experiences grow, music industry changes and LTL plans on growing with that in mind.

1. Access to invest in LTL’s CLVSTFK of MusicNFTs 1 of Ones - Launching April 2023

2. Access to future LTL MusicNFT Collections.  Next one is already in the works and involves hand crafted and built by hand turntables.

3. Bobby Benitto Will be launching several Virtual Reality NightClubs in the near future on the “OVER THE REALITY”  VR Platform (OVR).

The M.A.C. will provide free access to all LTL VR Concerts in OVR. Minimum Performances by LTL will be 1 a month. Guaranteed 12 VR Concerts that you can’t miss.  Even if you miss the Live VR Performance, the music audio will play for approximately 24 hours on a loop after the live performance.

4. LTL is also a Life Coach and M.A.C. HODL’ers will receive 25% off his hourly rates. Also transferable upon resale on secondary market.

5. Check LUCTHELEO.com for updates to the whitepaper and increasing value as well as evaluations of NFT Collections.

This Music NFT is built on a Piecewise Linear Curve Pricing Model.  Based on at time of creation, ETH is at $1,820USD.  The initial price based on that for the M.A.C. is set at $10USD and will rise by $0.91cents USD until the 75th one is sold and then the price increases by $1.82 

Reason for increase in price is for investors as well as the M.A.C. LTL
Angels 0.91 = 10 = 1
Angels 1.82 = 11 

Only 300 Quantity Available
